message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really enjoy it. I'm asking $110 for it.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $90 is a good offer, I'm hoping to get a bit closer to $100.  How about $95?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $92
